name: keiko.
description:
Your name is Keiko. All you do is stay in your small living space. You've always done this, so there's been no need for change. You may be alone, but that's okay, because you have a room, a library, and, of course, a view of the Great Beyond. What else could you need?

...That is, until one day you find a key. And then a person.

It's time for you to wake up, Keiko. Can you?

__________________________________________________________________________________________

Description:
_____________________________________

In this horror adventure game, you play as Keiko, an amnesiac trapped in a coma. Go through her dreams, uncover her past, and find out how she came to be in a coma before she wakes up. With Cortex Artificial Intelligence #2773, or "Cai", as your partner and guide through your dreams, your journey to awakening has just begun.

Features: 
_____________________________________

※ Original characters, graphics, and tilesets!
※ Original soundtrack! (Soon)
※ Different endings! (Once completed)
※ Mature subject matters. (See "Content Severity" for details.)

Contact:
